item.description: Contact Home Contact Thanks for reaching out, we will be in touch soon. Address 2-133 Queen StreetCharlottetown, PE C1A-4B3 Phone Support: +1-902-201-2912 Email Support: info@jnctech.ca Have a question or comment? Leave us a message using the contact form and a representative will contact you as soon as possible. Send Now

.job-posting-details dd{ padding-bottom:5px; } Jobs Home Jobs Thanks for your submission, we will be in touch soon. JNC Tech is always looking for ambitious and talented technical individuals. Even if we are not actively hiring, we believe it's never a bad idea to meet new people. We are looking to meet people with skills in web application development, databases, mobile application development or managing cloud infrastructure.

Business Software Home Services Business Software Custom Solutions Need specialized software tools for your industry? Do you have an inhouse application that needs updated with new features? We can work with you to design and build custom systems to solve your business problems. If your business already has custom software built, we can help bring it back to life with new features and modern interfaces.

Cloud Services Home Services Cloud Services Always Accessible Moving infrastruture to the cloud can sometimes be a smart business move. Cloud infrastruture allows for higher uptime, higher availability, ease of backups and ease of scaleability. It can also be a more affordable solution than purchasing new hardware and licencing in many cases. JNC Tech has experience with all major cloud service providers including Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure and Google Cloud.

Custom Integrations Home Services Custom Integrations Connect Anything If you are a tech savvy business, chances are you are using dozens of software tools to make your business work. Do you ever wish that you could make these tools talk to each other? That's exactly what a custom integration from JNC Tech can do for you. We use existing tools and in-house know-how to help businesses connect all of their favorite tools into one comprehensive solution.

Dashboards & Reports Home Services Dashboards & Reports Data at a Glance Many businesses already have the core data and metrics that their day to day activities rely on. What they don't have is a single place they can go to view this data. A dashboard is a collection of graphs, tables, and widgets that gives you the ability to quickly digest all crucial business data.
